name: Desktop Pet
description:
Desktop Pet is a life simulation game where you can take care of cute creatures while working or playing on your computer. Write documents, play games, watch videos, all together with your little companion.

Bring some cute life to your computer!

Features:
- watching your pets doing cute stuff
- feed your pets
- care about their needs such as food, sleep, happiness
- earn money and buy new looks and food
- playing with funny physics
- living your daily routine with your pet on your side
- easily unlockable achievements
